title: Homemade tomato ketchup
ingredients: ['6 large tomatoes, quartered', '1 bulb fennel, chopped', '1 yellow onion, chopped', '4 cloves garlic', '4 tablespoons caster sugar', '4 tablespoons treacle', '4 tablespoons red wine vinegar', '10 whole cloves', '2 whole star anise pods', '1 tablespoon salt']
